author: andschwa
body: We have NonWindowsGetMachineName, and I believe NonWindowsGetHostName can use the exact same P Invoke, so this should be pretty simple.  John Fawcett agrees .  This should return NonWindowsGetMachineName, plus  if available  NonWindowsGetDomainName.  For now, return GetMachineName, with    TODO PSL add domain name.  VSO create date - 8/6/2015 8:02:00     VSO closed date - 10/29/2015 11:13:00
title: Implement NonWindowsGetHostName
